content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at position(1.0, -60.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position(1.0, -60.0)
- Wooden chest at position(1.5, -58.5) storing iron ore
- Burner inserter at position(1.5, -57.5) moving items from chest to furnace
- Stone furnace at position(2.0, -56.0) smelting iron plates

###Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position(-28.0, -61.0)
- Stone furnace at position(-27.0, -59.0) smelting copper plates
- Burner inserter at position(-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at position(-26.5, -57.5)

###Production Line Setup around position(14.5, 14.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position(14.5, 14.5) for copper cable production
- Multiple wooden chests and burner inserters forming an input/output system:
  - Input chest at position(14.5, 11.5)
  - Output chest at position(11.5, 14.5)
  - Multiple burner inserters moving items between components

###Electronic Circuit Production at position(21.5, 15.5)
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position(21.5, 15.5)
- Input/output system with chests and inserters:
  - Output chest at position(24.5, 15.5)
  - Multiple burner inserters for material movement

###Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position(-7.5, 25.5)
- Additional offshore pumps at positions(2.5, 34.5) and (2.5, 36.5)
- Boiler at position(18.0, 47.5)
- Steam engine at position(29.5, 51.5)
- Complex pipe network connecting components
- Multiple electricity groups with poles

###Transport System
Multiple belt groups forming material transport networks:
- Main belt line from position(5.5, 8.5) to (14.5, 4.5)
- Various interconnected belt groups moving materials between production facilities

ERROR TIPS

### Power Connection Errors
- Ensure you have the required items (small electric poles) in inventory before attempting to connect power between entities
- Place power poles within connection range of each other

### Entity Status Issues
- Multiple assembling machines showing "not receiving electricity" - ensure proper power connection
- Several inserters showing "waiting for source items" - verify proper item supply chain
- Offshore pumps showing "No fluid present in connections" - ensure proper pipe connections

### Output Blocking Issues
- Mining drill output blocked by items on ground - ensure proper item collection setup with inserters/chests
- Furnace showing "full output" - implement proper output collection system

### Resource Flow Issues
- Several assembling machines cannot create items due to missing resources - ensure proper supply chain of materials
- Multiple fluid systems showing as empty - verify proper pipe connections and fluid flow
